articles.title: Paytm trades lower as investors rush to profit - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Paytm has also announced a partnership with Amadeus, a global travel technology company, to search and book flights as well as for payments
articles.content: Shares of One 97 Communications Limited, which owns Paytm, traded 0.4 percent lower on November 16 morning as investors rushed to book profits after the stock gained almost 3 percent the previous day… [+1501 chars]

articles.title: Religare Didnt Disclose Rs 250-Crore ESOPs Issued To Rashmi Saluja In Subsidiary, Says InGovern - BQ Prime
articles.description: This takes Saluja's total options holding to Rs 480 crore in addition to her compensation, says the proxy firm.
articles.content:
Religare Enterprises Ltd. failed to disclose employee stock options issued to Chairperson Rashmi Saluja in its subsidiary Care Health Insurance Ltd., according to a report by InGovern.
